remarks:
Multiplication of both sides of 'less than or equal to' by a nonnegative number.  (Contributed by NM, 21-Feb-2005.) 

---

 Multiplication of both sides of 'less than or equal to' by a nonnegative number.  Part of Definition 11.2.7(vi) of [HoTT], p.  (varies). (Contributed by NM, 21-Feb-2005.)
statement: lemul1a $p |- ( ( ( A e. RR /\ B e. RR /\ ( C e. RR /\ 0 <_ C ) ) /\ A <_ B ) -> ( A x. C ) <_ ( B x. C ) ) $.
